doctitle.textblock: Availability of U.S. Patents for Non-exclusive, Exclusive or Partially Exclusive Licensing

agency.textblock: U.S. Army Armament Research, Development and Engineering Center, DOD.

summary.textblock: In accordance with 37 CFR 404.6, announcement is made of the availability of the following U.S. patent for non-exclusive, exclusive or partially exclusive licensing. Patent Number 4,954,320 issued 9/4/90 to Birmingham et al., for Reactive Bed Plasma Air Purification.
The technology is applicable to controlling gaseous/chemical/biological pollution contamination.

In addition to the U.S. patent licensing opportunity, the Government is willing to file patents in foreign countries corresponding to the U.S. application, subject to negotiation with potential licensees to assume the costs of such foreign patent filings.

address.textblock: Commander, U.S. Army Armament Research, Development and Engineering Center, Picatinny Arsenal, NJ 07806-5000.

further.textblock: Mr. Edward Goldberg, Chief Patent Counsel, (508) 651-6590.
